channel.title: Aiden's Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Aiden's Tech Blog

item.title: First Post
item.description: Hi, I’m Aiden. I’m writing this tech blog to improve my software skills and English.

item.title: Go Maps - Missing Entry
item.description: What does Go Maps return if we look up a non-existent key?

item.title: Go - Addressable
item.description: Why can we use a value of type T to call a method declared with *T receiver instead of a pointer to that type?

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Aiden. I’m a full-stack engineer. I’m interested in web development. I’m writing this tech blog to improve my software skills and English. If you have any ideas or suggestions about my posts, please comment below each post. I can speak either English or Chinese. Feel free to comment!
